aboutPage.describe:
I've always been passionate about programming, which is why I chose an IT-focused field in high school that allowed me to gain valuable experience. To further deepen my knowledge and skills, I decided to continue my studies at Unicorn University.

During my studies at this university, I improved in various IT sectors, learned to work effectively in teams, and write technical documentation during application development.

Thanks to university and subsequent work experience, I gained solid foundations in JS React, C#, databases - MongoDB / MySQL, and other essential tools. Currently, I specialize in Backend development and application architecture, where I solve complex logical problems and optimize computational performance.

For the past several years, I've been working at YOUR SYSTEM, where I focus on developing applications and microservices for point-of-sale systems at gas stations. I have extensive experience with Node.js and PostgreSQL, which I actively use in real-world projects. I also work with other tools such as Dozzle for application logging and additional technologies needed for robust backend solutions.
aboutPage.motivationText:
I've been passionate about programming since the transition from primary to secondary school. What I appreciate most about this field is that it's a continuous journey of improvement - one can never be the best without constantly developing.

The rapid evolution in IT is both a challenge and an opportunity for me. Every day, I actively learn and apply new knowledge that comes from real projects and practical experience. This dynamism motivates me to continuously grow and seek optimal solutions.

What fascinates me most about IT is its diversity - every day brings new challenges, whether working with different programming languages, databases, or system architecture.

My goal is to constantly push the boundaries of my knowledge, apply best practices, and simultaneously discover innovative approaches that bring value to real-world projects.

unicorn.description: Work on development, testing (FE + BE), utilizing technical documentation.

yourSystem.description: Application development / microservices for controlling and point-of-sale systems at gas stations. Especially focusing on the backend part of the application using the database - PostgreSQL.

aboutPage.poeStashPrices: Simulate the price of stash tabs in Path of Exile.
aboutPage.wifiNameApp: Get Wi-Fi Name & Password where KeyContent is not empty.
aboutPage.overlayApp: Overlay app which is all time top most over another applications.
aboutPage.twilioLibraryApp: Library for sending SMS (now) and data as body of message.
aboutPage.shopApp: Testing Full Stack App in JS React / others programs.
aboutPage.feSeatCaseStudy: Launch the specified application according to the template.

contactPage.gdpr: I agree to the processing of personal data according to the GDPR.
